body_html:
These are the existing cells: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/rnn_cell/rnn_cells_for_use_with_tensorflow_s_core_rnn_methods

You can create custom cells by extending tf.nn.rnn_cell.RNNCell and overwriting method __call__(self, inputs, state, scope=None)
body_text:
These are the existing cells: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/rnn_cell/rnn_cells_for_use_with_tensorflow_s_core_rnn_methods
You can create custom cells by extending tf.nn.rnn_cell.RNNCell and overwriting method __call__(self, inputs, state, scope=None)
body:
These are the existing cells: https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/python/rnn_cell/rnn_cells_for_use_with_tensorflow_s_core_rnn_methods

You can create custom cells by extending `tf.nn.rnn_cell.RNNCell` and overwriting method `__call__(self, inputs, state, scope=None) `
